About

Kok Qi Sheng

ðŸš©CTF Player / âš¡EE Student

Currently pursuing my Bachelor's Degree in Electrical Engineering.

My main interests lie in embedded systems, hardware security, and low-level programming. Apart from my studies, I take cybersecurity as a hobby. I actively engaging myself in Capture The Flag (CTF) competitions and learning about vulnerabilities and exploits, focusing in the field of reverse engineering, binary exploitation and forensics.

Here I would share experiences in my studies, milestone projects and CTF journey.

My motto: No logs, No traces.
